history.proof: intros a b Q H1 H2. apply reduceplus_divp. qsimpl time: 1. intro H3. apply H2. qsimpl time: 1 use: reduce_divp.

ctx: intros a b Q H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H1 : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b) H2 : ~ zerop A A0 eqA n ltM a Unable to unify "reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b)" with "reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b)".

ctx: intros a b Q H1 H2.
intros a b Q H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply reduce_divp with (Q := b :: Q) (p := a) (q := b).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H1 : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b) H2 : ~ zerop A A0 eqA n ltM a H3 : zerop A A0 eqA n ltM a Unable to unify "exists r : poly A0 eqA ltM, In r (b :: b :: Q) /\\ divp A A0 eqA multA divA n ltM a r /\\ ~ zerop A A0 eqA n ltM r" with "zerop A A0 eqA n ltM a".

ctx: intros a b Q H1 H2.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (a b : poly A0 eqA ltM) (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b) -> ~ zerop A A0 eqA n ltM a -> exists r : poly A0 eqA ltM, In r (b :: Q) /\ divp A A0 eqA multA divA n ltM a r /\ ~ zerop A A0 eqA n ltM r

OrderStructure : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop

```coq
intros a b Q H1 H2.
apply reduceplus_divp.
exact H1.
intro H3.
apply H2.
intro H4.
apply reduce_divp with (Q := b :: Q) (p := a) (q := b).
exact H1.
Qed.```

original: intros a b Q H1 H2. apply reduceplus_divp. apply H1. intro H3. apply H2. intro H4. apply reduce_divp with (Q := b :: Q) (p := a) (q := b). apply H1.
